pageContext.claim: “They want very much to let people in prison -- like, as an example, the Boston bomber -- they want to let everybody vote. If you're in prison, if you're the Boston bomber, they want you to have a vote.”
pageContext.analysis: This was a Bernie Sanders position, not a Joe Biden position. Kamala Harris, campaigning in the primaries, said "I think we should have that conversation." But she added that it required more study and discussion with experts.
